pages.text: $(li)The Dropbear Claw can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/flint_and_steel)Flint and Steel$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)They can be used to brew a $(l:patchouli:potions/alexsmobs/clinging)Potion of Clinging$(/l) too.$(br)$(li)This item can only be dropped by $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/dropbear)Dropbears$(/l) on death.
